channel.title: Local plans on Digital Land
channel.description: Recent content in Local plans on Digital Land

item.description: Contents Current areas of investigation Upcoming areas of investigation Local plans project discovery report Timeline

We plan to explore the following by prototyping tools and by testing and consulting with people involved with developer contributions, and responding to your feedback. We will regularly add updates to the following issues on GitHub:

item.title: Alpha
item.description: Introduction In March 2020, we opened a supplier opportunity on Digital Marketplace to work on the local plans alpha phase. It was awarded to dxw digital. The alpha tested ideas for the better use of data held within, and about local plans. Data within local plans is information contained in a plan, such as the number of houses a local authority plans to build. An example of data about local plans might be an overview of when each local planning authority last published theirs.
